title: ranked problem
body: i won two games and i lost two on the promo to plat i won the last game and it doesn't count it a win

replies.body: Hey there, I took a look into this for you but wasn't able to find anything out of the ordinary.  I see to recent series but both had ended in a loss.  In addition to losing a match, being marked as a leaver can cause a loss as well.  Feel free to this us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll be happy to offer more context directly if you'd like.
